metadata.title: CVE-2018-1002200 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
plexus-archiver before 3.6.0 is vulnerable to directory traversal, allowingattackers to write to arbitrary files via a ../ (dot dot slash) in anarchive entry that is mishandled during extraction. This vulnerability isalso known as 'Zip-Slip'.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1002200` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libplexus-archiver-java - 3.6.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: plexus-archiver package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.0-2').
